title: The Girl with Many Names
description: The girl was not born with a dark heart, although darkness may have been her destiny. Mistreated and labelled a changeling, she finds her own path, but her journey is paved with fate and revenge to corrupt her heart and challenge her morality. Burdened with regret, she navigates through hapless encounters that lead her to the bitter truths of identity, redemption, and the ultimate confrontation with a fated adversary.Like dodging an arrow only to impale yourself on your opponent's blade, destiny will find a way.
author: S.    Knight
